channel.title: Making a Spawn Command ( Please Help )
channel.description:
Hey guys so im trying to make a command that gives you a korasi when you type:: korasi
This is what my command looks like: [code]if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("korasi")) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 100000000); player.getInventory().addItem(19784, 1);[/code]
The problem is that even without money in your inventory it spawns the korasi. How do i force the player to have money in their inventory or they can't spawn it?
Source Revision: dementhium 614/634

item.title: Making a Spawn Command ( Please Help )
item.dc:creator: @Jake440 Jake440
item.description:
@Jake440 wrote:

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("korasi") && player.getInventory().playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 100000000); player.getInventory().addItem(19784, 1); player.sendMessage("As your money disappears, a korasi spawns."); } else { player.sendMessage("You need 100M to do this."); }

I changed yours to this and got this error

[code]Def’s Property
src\org\dementhium\content\Commands.java:119: cannot find symbol
symbol : method playerHasItem(int,int)
location: class org.dementhium.model.player.Inventory
if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“korasi”) && player.getI
nventory().playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) {

      ^

1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Spawn Command ( Please Help )

item.title: Making a Spawn Command ( Please Help )
item.dc:creator: @buttaz54 buttaz54
item.description:
@buttaz54 wrote:

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("korasi") && player.getInventory().playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 100000000); player.getInventory().addItem(19784, 1); c.sendMessage("As your money disappears, a korasi spawns."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 100M to do this."); }

To convert it, just figure out what yours uses to figure out if the player has the item or not, and then change the code in this command to it.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Spawn Command ( Please Help )

item.title: Making a Spawn Command ( Please Help )
item.dc:creator: @Jake440 Jake440
item.description:
@Jake440 wrote:

[quote=“ImDatBoss, post:2, topic:433986”]Im using PI variables, redo them to your revision.

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“korasi”)) {
if (player.getInventory().playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) {
player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 100000000);
player.getInventory().addItem(19784, 1);
} else {
player.sendMessage("You need to have atleast 100000000 GP to do that!
}[/quote]

I changed my command to this

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("korasi") && playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 100000000); player.getInventory().addItem(19784, 1); } else { player.sendMessage("You need to have atleast 100000000 GP to a Spawn Korasi!");

And got this error

Def's Property :) src\org\dementhium\content\Commands.java:119: cannot find symbol symbol : method playerHasItem(int,int) location: class org.dementhium.content.Commands if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("korasi") && playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“korasi”)) {
if (player.getInventory().playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) {
player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 100000000);
player.getInventory().addItem(19784, 1);
} else {
player.sendMessage("You need to have atleast 100000000 GP to do that!
}
